sub_title: I'm myself - Everyone else is already taken
summary:
Yes, I changed my description again! #guilty

2021 marked an interesting change in my life. I took the jump into the cold water and moved from the Oil&Gas industry to the Water Industry (Environmental).üåä

With that I went from Direct Sales to Technical Sales to sharpen my skills in other directions and gain deep insight on the software and its features - because, why not! üòè I love to question everything so it's nice to be able to ask without people telling you to just focus on selling and not understanding.

Anyway...with 2022 I have now started a new chapter in my life by moving my point of life to Netherlands, but nowadays it‚Äôs easier to reach out to customers EMIA wide, so it certainly feels like a promotion of territory and I am pretty excited to get in touch with prospects and interested parties to explore the new world üåé of Water management with AQUARIUS.

Feel free to contact me if you want to know more about me, or Aquarius or just love to chat!

Intan üåªüòÅ
